attributes.action: Let us all KEEP Fox Hunting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am making this petition because there are a lot of people who AGREE with Fox Hunting. And the people who don't...well they don't have to do it do they? No they dont! So keep fox hunting for us!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
